projects.title: Jetpack Pupper

points: Compete with your friends for biggest highscore!

projects.title: Catalog Project
projects.description: Catalog project. A project where users can signup and then view and create their own restaurants and menu items.
points: Database built with SQLAlchemy and SQLite

projects.title: Multi-User Blog
projects.description: A multi user blog built using webapp2 and Google App Engine. Users can make accounts, create new posts, and comment on posts.
points: Database built using Google App Engine datastore
Secure user signup and login - passwords hashed using sha256
Built with webapp2, Python, and Jinja

projects.title: High Noon
projects.description: High Noon is a local HTML5 shooter game built using HTML canvas and Javascript. Fight to the death in the wild west!
points: Game and engine built with Javascript
